pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Statistical Quality Control // This is a toolkit for multivariate process monitoring. It computes several multivariate control charts e.g. Hotelling, Chi-squared, MEWMA, MCUSUM and Generalized Variance. Ten didactic datasets are included. It also contains some tools for assessing multivariate normality e.g. Mardia's, Royston's and Henze- Zirkler's tests. Please, see the NEWS file for the latest changes in the package.
